snippet: Use of BlackBerry’s new smartphone, the Z10, spiked sharply after it went on sale in Verizon Wireless stores, according to a new analysis of mobile data.
abstract: Use of BlackBerry’s new smartphone, the Z10, spiked sharply after it went on sale in Verizon Wireless stores, according to a new analysis of mobile data.

headline.main: Verizon Is the New BlackBerry's Best Friend
